game.title: The quest of the lost treasure
game.description: You will have to find the lost treasure in the old castle.

task.description: You will have to find the old castle and enter it.
You will have to search for the lost treasure within the old castle.
Look for any hidden clues that may lead you to the lost treasure.
You must defeat the guardian protecting the treasure chamber.
Retrieve the lost treasure and bring it back to the quest giver.
